dct_title_s: Map of the peninsula of Mount Sinai and Arabia Petraea from the itinieraries of E. Robinson and E. Smith
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Cover title: Maps of Robinson's researches in Palestine. Includes two insets: Region between Cairo and Suez -- Plan of Petra from Laborde. "Engr.a by L. Lipmann". Historic Maps copy 2 (52 x 41 cm.) not in case.
